# forMerging | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Foundation ](/documentation/foundation)

-  forMerging 

Type Property# forMerging

iOS 2.0+iPadOS 2.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.0+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
static var forMerging: NSFileCoordinator.WritingOptions { get }
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/Foundation/NSFileCoordinator/WritingOptions/forMerging#Discussion)

When this constant is specified, the file coordinator calls the [`savePresentedItemChanges(completionHandler:)`](/documentation/foundation/nsfilepresenter/savepresenteditemchanges(completionhandler:)) method of relevant file presenters to give them a chance to save their changes before your code makes its changes.

## [See Also](/documentation/Foundation/NSFileCoordinator/WritingOptions/forMerging#see-also)
